Detailed Description

A static top level object required for all DynAPI related functions.

The "DynAPI" object is the top level object in the DynAPI library. It is used primarily as a way to organize miscelleneous variables, and generic functions, and to attach single instance objects (such as DynLayer, DynDocument etc.). Every graphical component branches off from the DynAPI object. For example, the main browser document is referenced as a DynDocument that is a property of the DynAPI object (DynAPI.document). All DynLayers that are in that document are in a collection underneath DynAPI.document.children[] and so on.

All DynAPI methods can be accessed like: 

 DynAPI.addPackage("dynapi.api");

Member Function Documentation

void DynAPI::addLibrary ( string packagename,
string files[] )
 

Adds the given array of file names to the given package name.

For example: 

 DynAPI.addPackage("dynapi.api",["dynlayer","dyndocument"]);

If the given package does not exist, it will be created automatically.

void DynAPI::addPackage ( string package )
 

Adds a package to the DynAPI.

For example, DynAPI.addPackage("dynapi.api") makes the "dynapi.api" package available to be used with wildcards in DynAPI.include().

DynDocument DynAPI::getDocument ( string id )
 

Returns the DynDocument with the given id.

If no id is given, the default DynDocument is returned.

void DynAPI::include ( string src,
string path )
 

Includes the given library.

If path is present, src is considered to be a acutall directory path. Otherwise, the given package file is included.

Two ways to use this method: 

 DynAPI.include("dynapi.api.browser");
 DynAPI.include("myfile.js","../src/");

void DynAPI::loadHandler ( ) [private]
 

Called on page load.

void DynAPI::mountplugin ( object plugin )
 

Mounts the plugin object to be used during unload, load, and resize events.

void DynAPI::removeFromArray ( object array[],
object index,
boolean id )
 

Removes index object from array.

If id is true then it removed index.id.

void DynAPI::resizeHandler ( ) [private]
 

Called on page resize.

void DynAPI::setLibraryPath ( string path )
 

Sets the path to the library.

string DynAPI::toString ( )
 

Returns "DynAPI" which is a reference to the DynAPI Object.

void DynAPI::unloadHandler ( ) [private]
 

Called on page unload.

boolean DynAPI::loaded [private]
 

Set to true when the document has been loaded.
